| HistoryText             = A group of [[Vampires]] gathered by Japanese vampire [[Raizo Kodo (Earth-616)|Raizo Kodo]], the group accompanied Kodo when he offered his assistance to [[Vlad Dracula (Earth-616)|Dracula]] when the vampire lord's [[Romania|Romanian]] castle came under attack by a Nul-possessed [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]]. 

Seen as threats and imprisoned, the Forgiven broke loose with little effort, hoping to provide the aid they had offered.{{r|Fear Itself: Hulk vs. Dracula #1}} Assaulting the arriving Hulk, the Forgiven found themselves beaten, one after the other, with little effort from the Hulk, though they managed to evacuate the nearby town of Pasnic.{{r|Fear Itself: Hulk vs. Dracula #2}} Continuing to hold back the Hulk, the team attempted to stop him by ramming two trains into him at the same time, to little effect. 

After Dracula's forces tried, and failed, to stop the Hulk, the timely arrival of Raizo and, seemingly, [[Elizabeth Ross (Earth-616)|Red She-Hulk (Betty Ross)]] proved enough to finally force the Nul persona from Hulk, restoring him to his old self, and ending his rampage. 

An angry Hulk stormed off shortly after the revelation that "Betty" was actually Forgiven member [[Inka (Earth-616)|Inka]], using a [[Claw Sect (Earth-616)|Claw sect]] technique that allowed her to mask her appearance.{{r|Fear Itself: Hulk vs. Dracula #3}}

Collecting [[Hammer of Nul|Nul's hammer]], the group hid in a cabin in [[Transylvania]] until the arrival of [[Brunnhilde (Earth-616)|Valkyrie]]. After a brief duel over the hammer, Raizo agreed to hand it over.{{r|Fear Itself: The Fearless #2}}

The Forgiven later greeted [[Jubilation Lee (Earth-616)|Jubilee]] following her crash landing while trying to disable a [[Sentinels|Sentinel]]{{r|X-Men Vol 3 #23}} and sought to help her overcome her need for human blood, as they had been helped themselves by Raizo.{{r|X-Men Vol 3 #24}} 

When confronted by the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]], the two teams briefly battled before Jubilee separated them, just in time for [[Piotr Rasputin (Earth-616)|Colossus]] to arrive with the [[Zapata Brothers (Earth-616)|Zapata Brothers]], the first of many assassins arriving to kill Raizo.{{r|X-Men Vol 3 #25}}
